Title: Systems Check Project - NestJS & Next.js Combined
Description: A fully working system combining backend (NestJS) and frontend (Next.js) for internal tool verification. Built reusable modules and UI components while testing the integration and real-world setup.

Title: Fisrt Step (KSA)
Description: A middleware platform connecting nurseries and parents in Saudi Arabia. It supports child enrollment, center registration, multiple branches, pricing logic, and communication between parents and education centers.

Title: Mock API Platform with Laravel & React
Description: A simulated API and frontend environment built for testing API consumption and UI flows using Laravel (REST API) and React. Used for prototyping projects and frontend testing before real backend integration.
Features: Mocked user endpoints and auth flows

Title: Tuba Healthcare & Medical Insurance Portal
Description: A scalable medical insurance management system for healthcare providers and companies.
